Title: Using the Same Arch Linux Installation for a Decade
Description: As of today, I’ve been using the same Arch Linux installation for ten years on my main computer. I don’t have much to say, but I’m writing this because my experience doesn’t match the common notion that Arch Linux is unstable.1 I’m not trying to convince anyone to use Arch Linux. ↩

Title: .NET 6 is now in Ubuntu 22.04
Description: .NET 6 is now included in Ubuntu 22.04 (Jammy) and can be installed with just `apt install dotnet6`.

Title: What's New in Visual Studio 2022 17.4 Preview 1
Description: We released Visual Studio 2022 17.4 Preview 1 last week alongside the 17.3 generally available release. In this post we’ll share details about some of the new capabilities in this preview and the focus of this release. Feedback from developers like you during our preview cycle is so important for us to deliver a final product that meets your high expectations.

Title: How and why I built Japan Dev
Description: Japan Dev started as a list of companies I wanted to work for back in 2014.  Here's the story of how that idea morphed into a job board showcasing hundreds of Japan's best tech companies.

Title: .NET 6 is now in Ubuntu 22.04
Description: .NET 6 is now included in Ubuntu 22.04 (Jammy) and can be installed with just `apt install dotnet6`.

Title: Janet Jackson had the power to crash laptop computers
Description: Not an artistic judgement. Just a technical one.

Title: Malicious PyPi packages aim DDoS attacks at Counter-Strike servers
Description: A dozen malicious Python packages were uploaded to the PyPi repository this weekend in a typosquatting attack that performs DDoS attacks on a Counter-Strike 1.6 server.

Title: Cloudflare Support Portal gets an overhaul
Description: The Cloudflare Support team has launched a new Support Portal. The portal will give you access to self-help resources, diagnostics with troubleshooting guides, and will provide for easier ticket submission

Title: Open-source rival for OpenAI's DALL-E runs on your graphics card
Description: OpenAI's DALL-E 2 is getting free competition. Behind it is an AI open-source movement and the startup Stability AI.

Title: How Discord Supercharges Network Disks for Extreme Low Latency
Description: It's no secret that Discord's your place to talk; 4 billion messages sent a day have us convinced. But text only accounts for a chunk of the features that Discord supports — learn how Discord optimizes its platform to respond to the high frequency of queries for all types of content and data as quickly as possible.
